entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 11:08 AM PDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:18 AM PDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:18 AM PDT Sunday 08 May 2016
